CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Serenity Wellness Hub relative to Meridian Health Post?
SRP.A: Serenity Wellness Hub is {below} Meridian Health Post in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Health Post relative to Serenity Wellness Hub?
SRP.A: Meridian Health Post is {above} Serenity Wellness Hub in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Health Post relative to Vitality Clinic?
SRP.A: Meridian Health Post is {above} Vitality Clinic in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patient visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Serenity Wellness Hub}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patient visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Vitality Clinic}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Vitality Clinic's maximum Patient Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Vitality Clinic's maximum Patient Visits is in {1999}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Serenity Wellness Hub's maximum Patient Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Serenity Wellness Hub's maximum Patient Visits is in {2013}.

NC.Q: Was the total Patient Visits in 2008 higher or lower than in 2009?
NC.A: The total patient visits in 2008 was {lower} than in 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2006, was the average total Patient Visits higher or lower than between 2001 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total patient visits between 2001 and 2006 was {higher} than between 2001 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2009, was the average total Patient Visits higher or lower than between 2004 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total patient visits between 2002 and 2009 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2007, was the average total Patient Visits higher or lower than between 2001 and 2006?
NC.A: The average total patient visits between 2006 and 2007 was {higher} than between 2001 and 2006.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Serenity Wellness Hub} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Meridian Health Post and Serenity Wellness Hub first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Meridian Health Post and Serenity Wellness Hub first exchanged leading positions in {2001}.
